transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, Madhavi ma'am, Namaskar. Ma'am, Alok Pandey bol raha hun main. IndiaMART se Ashutosh ka manager.
Customer: Haan, haan, ji, ji.
Executive: Ji ma'am, bataiye kya issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Sir, IndiaMART mein ek product hum log diye the, Eridge Gold bolke. To uske vajah se na mujhe High Court se notice sir, two time matlab, ek to IndiaMART by order bolke ek aaya abhi just. Aur post office mein ek wo log bheje hain.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Notice bheje hain ki matlab pura to matlab main to dusre jagah mein rehti hun na. To dukan mein aaya hai abhi.
Customer: Lekin wo product to automatically delete ho gaya hai shayad.
Executive: Koi aur company delete kiya shayad?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Keh raha hun koi aur company to nahi hai similar type IndiaMART se?
Customer: Ji, yahi company hai aapki company hai aapki IndiaMART ki. Haan, haan.
Customer: Smarani ka agri hoti.
Executive: What ma'am?
Customer: Smarani ka agri hoti services se na?
Executive: Nahi nahi, main aapse kya keh raha hun? Main keh raha hun isi company ke liye notice aaya hai Smarani ka agri hoti service ke liye ya kisi aur company ke liye aaya hai?
Customer: Isi company.
Executive: Achcha. Lekin
Customer: Wo jo pesticide ka company hai na Eridge India bolke, Eridge company. Wahan se notice aaya hai.
Executive: Achcha. Main ek baar dekh leta hun. Kaun se product ke liye aaya hai ma'am?
Customer: Eridge Gold.
Executive: Ek second. Nahi aap company ka naam bata rahi hain, product main puch raha hun. Kaun se product ke liye aaya hai?
Customer: Product ka hi to Eridge Gold.
Executive: Achcha Eridge Gold.
Customer: Sir, Agromin Gold, sorry sorry sorry. Agromin Gold sir.
Executive: Wahi ma'am product kuch dusra tha aapne galat bataya tha isliye main puch raha tha. Haan haan, Agromin Gold.
Executive: Ek second ma'am.
Executive: Kaun sa product ma'am keh rahi thi aap?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Ma'am keh raha hun kaun sa product aap keh rahi hain abhi?
Customer: Ji?
Executive: Product ka naam kya bataya aapne fir se bataiye ek baar. Agromin Gold, A G R O M I N.
Executive: Agromine Gold.
Customer: Agromin, M I N.
Executive: Haan haan ma'am, okay, min.
Executive: Kya?
Executive: Ye to product ma'am aapke mein hai nahi abhi waise bhi. Haan delete ho gaya hai. Agromin Gold aapne delete kar diya hai. Videos ma'am abhi bhi laga hua hai.
Customer: Haan? Aapne inactive kar diya hai us product ko?
Customer: Nahi main nahi kiya hun sir, automatically ho gaya hai.
Executive: Suniye ma'am kya hota hai, isme maan lijiye aapne kisi brand ka le rakha ho ki bas main hi ise bech sakti hun authority. Theek hai?
Executive: Aur aap koi uska distributor thik leta hai ya koi leta hai kuch to bech sakta hai. Agar koi nahi liya hai aur us product ko use kar raha hai, marketing kar raha hai, business kar raha hai to uspe wo copyright lagta hai. Copyright ka aaya hoga ma'am aur kuch to nahi aaya hoga.
Customer: Nahi main aapko WhatsApp mein mujhe high bhejiye to isme main bhej deti hun. To ma'am aapko kisi company ne bheja hai na isme IndiaMART ka kya involvement hai mujhe ye to samjhaiye. Ki aapko IndiaMART se kya chahiye, kya ummid chahiye, kya hope hai aapko? IndiaMART kya kare aapke liye aap mujhe ye bataiye. Nahi nahi nahi ye baat nahi
Customer: Aap log ko samajhna chahiye na wo to online mein dikhaya bolke wo notice aaya na. If IndiaMART ne pehle se bata deta. If product hum log dal rahe hain aap log bolte hain ki product dalo. If hum log product kya kya aap log ka hai matlab ye hone se ye complaint aayega wo log to aap log ko pata hona chahiye na ye product mat dalo aur aap log hi khud delete kar dena chahiye na.
Executive: Achcha achcha to ma'am aap keh rahi hain ki ma'am IndiaMART IndiaMART ne kabhi aapse ye kaha ma'am ki aap kisi aur brand ka photo la ke laga dijiye. IndiaMART to hamesha yahi kehti hai ki aap apne camere se apne photo jo product hain aapke unke pictures ko aap click kariye fir ja ke wo photos lagaiye. Apne personal photos lagaiye. Nahi nahi nahi
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi. Abhi to ma'am aaj ke date mein suniye to ma'am aaj ke date mein IndiaMART agar aap kisi another product ki photo lagate ho na ya fir kuch bhi andar lagta hai to wo apne aap deactivate ho jata hai ma'am. Auto reject ho jate hain ma'am photos aapke. Itna din se kaise tha?
Executive: Bilkul bilkul bilkul lekin ma'am ab sare product hum to aise nahi diye hain na Google se la ke de diye. Bilkul bilkul.
Customer: Mam to aap ho sakta hai ki kya ma'am abhi to aap mujhe bhejo main dekhta hun. Ab IndiaMART ki involvement isme to nahi ho sakti ma'am IndiaMART uske liye kya karegi? Notice aaye hai to IndiaMART se hi aayi hai na hum log product diye bolke na. Aapko notice aayi hai.
Customer: To IndiaMART ne bolna chahiye ki ye product dal nahi sakte ho wo nahi hai na. At least to ye batana chahiye. Aapne hata diya na ma'am aap pareshan mat hoiye aapne hata diya na product.
Executive: Aapne hata diya na product.
Customer: Nahi wo to khud hi company shayad delete kiya wo to ma'am ko main samchi ma'am ko bhi puchi thi ki kaise delete hua bolke. Ye to ek bar jo log dekh rahe hain bhi wo log batana chahiye hum log ko to sab chiz pata nahi hota hai na.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul ma'am aage se ma'am pura dhyan dunga ki aapke jo guide kar rahe hain wo sari chize ma'am ye sab chize dekhen. Aage se ma'am aapko aise issue face nahi hone dunga ma'am. Ye issue ma'am ho gaya nahi dhyan diya unhone. dekhiye mera to company ka kuch bhi nahi hai mera khud ka brand nahi hai. To hum log to kyu bechhenge then band kar denge na. Hum log to company ka dekh ke hi karte hain na sir. Ha bilkul bilkul sahi keh rahi hain aap.
Executive: Ek bar main dekhta hun ma'am kya ho sakta hai apne upper level pe bhi discuss karta hun is chiz ko. Theek hai? Aap bilkul befikar rahiye ma'am pareshan mat hoiye. dekhiye zindagi mein mera court ka ye police chokkar kabhi hua nahi hai hum log hum log bhi to main to dar gayi kya hua bolke main to kuch kiya hi nahi. aapka copyright pareshan ma'am bahut badi chiz nahi hai ye aap bilkul pareshan na hoiye. Ye bahut badi chiz nahi hai aapko court kacheri jana padega. Aap bilkul okay rahiye koi dikkat nahi hai. Agar IndiaMART se issue hua hai to koi masla nahi hai. Ek bar main ja ke discuss karta hun aapke upar koi baat nahi aayegi bilkul pareshan mat hoiye. Theek hai? Aap apna aram se business kariye. Ha jo jo product ke liye aaya hai notice wo product IndiaMART se delete kar dijiye hata dijiye. Uska video abhi dikh raha hai us video ko bhi delete kar dijiye. Naam bhi hata dijiye sab hata dijiye. Theek hai ma'am? Okay ma'am aage aur dekh lijiye aur usse related koi aur us company ka product to nahi laga rakha hai aapne wo bhi hata dijiye ma'am. Theek hai? Theek hai ji.
Executive: Okay ma'am. Koi issue ho to bataiyega ma'am. Theek hai?
summary:
Concerns:

- Received High Court notice due to product listing.

- Notice received due to product Eridge Gold.

- Worried about legal implications.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed product was already deleted.

- Explained copyright issues related to unauthorized product listings.

- Assured customer of support and internal discussion.

- Advised to remove product and related content.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will discuss internally.

- Customer to remove product and related content.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- notice, product, deletion, copyright, listing
